title: Sales Reps (Work-at-Home)
job_overview:
We are a fast-growing U.S. based company seeking a Work-at-Home Sales Rep to make sales calls to our "warm" leads.

We require someone with great sales experience to hear customer questions, determine budget, create package deals based on customer's budget and close deals over the phone to drive company revenue. We will provide an internet telephone line for incoming and outgoing calls.

We pay $4.50 Per Hour + 1% Commission + BONUS !!!

Job Details:
- Excellent ENGLISH SPEAKING SKILLS
- Previous experience in sales, customer service, or other related fields
- Familiarity with CRM platforms
- Ability to build rapport with clients
- Strong negotiation skills
- Good Communication and Writing Skills
- Must have a fast HIGH SPEED internet connection
- Must have a quiet home office to work from
- Graveyard Shift (11:00 AM to 8:00 PM EST.)

Responsibilities:
- Present and sell company products and services to new and existing customers
- Prospect and contact potential customers
- Reach agreed upon sales targets by the deadline
- Resolve customer inquiries
- Set follow-up appointments to keep customers aware of latest developments
